questions.question_text: A project manager has contracted a third-party vendor to achieve milestones. Which of the following risk strategies is the project manager applying?

A stakeholder has identified a new requirement that enhances the performance of the final deliverable. The project team has evaluated the impact, and it was approved by the CCB. Which of the following actions should the project manager take NEXT?

discussion.content: The PM should implement the change, before the change can be validated!
